mapper.select: SELECT a.nsSeq, a.nsName, a.nsOpenTime, a.nsClosTime, a.nsMulti, a.nsLogo, a.nsGallery, a.nsInfoText, a.nsZipCode, a.nsAddr, a.nsAddDetail, a.nsInfoWalk, a.nsInfoPrice, a.nsInfoEvent, a.nsInfoDetail, a.naAddParkingNy, a.nsAddDogNy, a.nsAddArtOfMonthNy, a.nsAddDrillcareNy, a.nsAddWetcareNy, a.nsStar, a.nsRegDate, a.nsEditDate, a.nsDelNy FROM bears.B_shop a ORDER BY a.nsSeq DESC
